CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( "https://"&IF( CONTAINS(breadwinner_qbo__QBO_Org_Name__c , "Sandbox Company"), "sandbox." ,"") &"qbo.intuit.com/app/"& CASE( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c,
'Credit Memo', "creditmemo?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)-FIND('-CM-', breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c) - 3 )),
'Sales Receipt', "salesreceipt?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)-FIND('-SR-', breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)- 3)),
'Refund Receipt', "refundreceipt?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)-FIND('-RR-', breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)- 3)),
"invoice?txnId="&RIGHT(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c,(LEN(breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c)-FIND('-INV-', breadwinner_qbo__Invoice_Id__c) - 4 ))
), "Click Here" )
CustomField.label: See this Invoice in QuickBooks Online
